Uses of Class
noppes.npcs.api.event.ProjectileEvent

Packages that use ProjectileEvent
Package
Description
noppes.npcs.api.event
This package contains event classes whose instances are dispatched to the corresponding hook functions (if present) in CNPC scripts.

  • Uses of ProjectileEvent in noppes.npcs.api.event

    Subclasses of ProjectileEvent in noppes.npcs.api.event
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    ProjectileEvent.ImpactEvent
    Hook function name: projectileImpact
    Triggered when the projectile hits a block or an entity.
    static class 
    ProjectileEvent.UpdateEvent
    Hook function name: projectileTick
    Triggered every 5 game ticks (0.25 seconds expected.)
